author: A_Brickset_user
title: Full speed ahead!
review: Wow! Hands on the wheel. This set is simply great! Fits perfectly together with set number 6337. The tires are soft but pick up a lot of dust. It's fun to drive into puddles on the baseplates and slip into buildings.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Good and simple
review: When I was 5 (i think) got this set ,but being young I took It a part and re built it. Then I wanted to make the orgionale but couldn't find some peices. So I bought another one. If you Find this in a store I highly recomend it!

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Best small Racecar
review: This is the best of the 3 classic LEGO Town racecars. It's a pretty nice design and the size is right for a small minifig Set. The minifig is more detailed, than those in the older two racers I own. And the whole design is more realistic than the other two ones. There are even smooth wheels, which give this a better realism.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Easy To Get
review: This is the easiest F1 race car to get. The other F1 race cars are sold in much larger sets, which are much harder to get. I like  this set(and this type of cars) because they look cool with their realistic design. The "octan" signs and  pieces with #4 on them are not stickers, which means that they would not come off, but stay on for long time. I like all-red race minifigure. Overall good race car for affordable price. 5/5

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Racing) - Slick Racer Review
review:
This is a fun little model to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has a lot of useful pieces for future MOC's and/or brickfilms. I also like the printed tiles with the 'Octan' logo on it.

Minifigures

The driver has a red overall and a red helmet with some white stars on it. On his face we can see black shades as well.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't have to complain about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/6546-1.jpg[/img]


This vehicle may doesn't do much but it's still fun to maneuver it around. The only play feature which this set has is that the rear-wing can be adjusted. The driver fits in his cockpit very nice and easy. I really like the design of this car.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Stopmotion 2

Stopmotion 3

Stopmotion 4

Review

author: legomaniac_jacob
title: Great racecar
review: My brother gave me this set for one of my birthdays when I was younger.  I really liked it.  I identified well with the minifig and his cool helmet.  I especially like how smooth the rubber tires were, they seemed very realistic.  I also liked the color scheme on this car, very memorable and aligned with the Octan theme.
